articles.author: Ellise Shafer
articles.title: Jonathan Glazer Donates Signed ‘Zone of Interest’ Posters to Cinema for Gaza Auction; Fundraiser Reaches Over $50,000 in First Day - Variety
articles.description: 'The Zone of Interest' director Jonathan Glazer has donated signed posters to the Cinema for Gaza auction following his Oscars speech.
articles.content: “The Zone of Interest” director Jonathan Glazer has donated signed posters to the Cinema for Gaza auction, which has collected gifts from major names in the U.K. entertainment industry to raise money… [+2165 chars]
